Hello world!

"Who are you?" - Dr. Buddy Rydell

I could introduce myself in many ways. Like, you can find me in hackthebox as eggd, in github as the-eggof-d or, as in real life, in LinkedIn as Thaleia-Elpis Kavalierou. Yes, you may call me Thaleia. As for "who I am", well, that's the reason I created security.egg. Currently, I am a student of Informatics and Computer Engineering at University of West Attica with a great passion for cyber security (or cybersecurity, or cyber-security). Still, my studies are not enough for me. I continually seek for more knowledge, more challenges, g1v3_m3_m0r3_fl4gs, more thrills. What can I say?
I am just an IT security geek...
